name: Black Key
description: A small black key, looks like it could open a door.

name: Blue Key
description: A small blue key, looks like it could open a door.

name: Cell Key
description: A small key that looks like it could open a cell door.

name: Rusty Spoon
description: An old, rusty spoon. Not very useful as a weapon, but could be used to dig or pry.

name: Fortune Cookie
description: A cookie that contains a small piece of paper with a fortune written on it.

name: Bandages
description: A set of clean bandages. Can be used to heal wounds.
